info.title: Callboard API docs
info.description: API documentation for GoIT project 'Callboard'. [Backend github repository](https://github.com/DanTsvirkun/callboard-backend)

403.description: Email doesn't exist / Password is wrong

post.summary: Get new pair of tokens (use Bearer {refreshToken} instead of accessToken)

400.description: Bad request (invalid request body) / No token provided

get.summary: Google authentication. WARNING: Works only for sign-in, after registered on front-end (if you're writing your back-end for a SPECIFIC front-end, then you can configure it right to work both for sign-up & sign-in)

200.description: Successful operation (redirect to front-end with accessToken, refreshToken and sid in query). Then use GET /user

403.description: Not registered or registered with postman

get.summary: Get user's information by access token
Get user's information by user id

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User's id ('id' field in user's object)

400.description: Bad request (invalid request body) / No token provided / More than 5 images provided / No images provided / Setting a price for: Free, work or trade category

get.summary: Get pages with categories by query pagination

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Number of the page you want to load (1-3)

400.description: Bad request (invalid query) / No token provided

parameters.name: callId
parameters.description: Call's id ('id' field in call's object)

400.description: Bad request (invalid id) / No token provided

404.description: Call not found / Invalid user / Invalid session

parameters.name: callId
parameters.description: Call's id ('id' field in call's object)

400.description: Bad request (invalid id) / No token provided

404.description: Call not found / Invalid user / Invalid session

parameters.name: callId
parameters.description: Call's id ('id' field in call's object)

requestBody.description: Call's object (at least 1 field is required)

400.description: Bad request (invalid request body or id) / No token provided / Setting the same price / More than 5 images provided / Setting a price for: Free, work or trade category

404.description: Call not found / Invalid user / Invalid session

parameters.name: callId
parameters.description: Call's id ('id' field in call's object)

400.description: Bad request (invalid id) / No token provided

404.description: Call not found / Invalid user / Invalid session

get.summary: Get pages with categories by query pagination

400.description: Bad request (invalid query) / No token provided

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Category you want to load (property, transport, work, electronics, businessAndServices, recreationAndSport, free, trade)

accessToken.description: Session's access token (needed for all requests)

description.example: New red shirt, made from cotton

oldPrice.description: Call's old price (if was changed and became lower)
Call's old price (if was changed and became lower)

description.example: New red shirt, made from cotton

oldPrice.description: Call's old price (if was changed and became lower)
Call's old price (if was changed and became lower)

description.example: New red shirt, made from cotton

file.description: Call's image (could be more than one, maximum 5)

description.example: New red shirt, made from cotton

oldPrice.description: Call's old price (if was changed and became lower)

description.example: New red shirt, made from cotton

file.description: Call's image (could be more than one, maximum 5)

imageUrls.description: Stringified array of image URLs. Set here links to old photos (on GCP). Use if you want to delete existing photos (send stringified array with all links except the one you want to delete)

oldPrice.description: Call's old price (if was changed and became lower)
